Description of incident: The Peppermill Resort Spa & Casino notified customers of a breach  when their front desk system compromising customer payment card  information and the security codes on the back of the cards. According  to the casino, the hack occurred between October 12, 2014 and February  16, 2015. The casino was asked to delay notifying individuals by federal  authorities while they investigated the incidence. More information: http://ago.vermont.gov/assets/files/Consumer/Security_Breach/Peppermill%...
